#Text= Aang says : " Hello , I 'm sorry to barge in like this , but I need some medicine for my friends , they have fevers and they were coughing - " Herbalist says : " Settle down , young man .

column1: #Text=Your friends are going to be fine .
#Text=I 've been up here for over forty years you know , used to be others , but they all left years ago .
#Text=Now it 's just me and Miyuki .
#Text=" Aang says : " That 's nice .
#Text=" Herbalist says : " Wounded Earth Kingdom troops still come by now and again , brave boys , and thanks to my remedies they always leave in better shape they when they arrive .
#Text=" Aang says : " That 's nice .
#Text=Are you almost done ?
#Text=" Herbalist says : " Hold on , I just need to add one last ingredient .
#Text=Oh , sandalwood ... oh , er , uh , that wo n't do , banana leaf ?
#Text=Ah , nope , uh , ginger root , uh uh , oh where is that pesky little plant ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Is everything okay ?
#Text=It 's been almost an hour and you have n't given the men an order .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I do n't care what they do .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Do n't give up hope yet .
#Text=You can still find the Avatar before Zhao .
#Text=" Zuko says : " How , Uncle ?
#Text=With Zhao 's resources , it 's just a matter of time before he captures the Avatar .
#Text=My honor , my throne , my country , I 'm about to lose them all .
#Text="
